title: Champion Select Timers Are Buggy Cost Me a promo HAHAHAHAH
body:
Basically, I was trying to decide what would be best my pick whilst watching the timer countdown. Interestingly enough, the game kicked me out whilst I had 6 seconds left to decide. 

I am not sure if this a bug, however for the sake of other people who may experience this, is there anything that can be done to display accurate timers.

Thanks

replies.body: I thought it was coded so that the timer refreshed every second. LOOKS LIKE IT AIN'T.

Hey Zmyba,
This issue normally happens if there is a drop in connection between your computer and our servers. This could be your modem dropping out, your ISP having a minor "blip" in their network (or any network they cross between).

If this continues to happen, please head over to http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/tools/network-logs and follow the steps there to reun a diagnostic report and send the results to ocelivereports@riotgames.com.

We can then look into your ISP and see if there is something we can do with them to help improve the connection for you.

-ToxicHawk
